body: {"title":"Cereal 02","ingredients": [{"name": "Your favorite cereal", "amount": "2", "unit": "cups"}, {"name": "Milk", "amount": "1.5", "unit": "Cups"}],"instructions":"Add cereal to a bowl. Pour in milk. Serve and eat immediately so cereal does not get soggy.","attachment": null}

{"title":"Guacamole 02","ingredients": [{"name": "Avocados", "amount": "3", "unit": "each"}, {"name": "Red Onion - diced", "amount": "1/4", "unit": "Cup"}, {"name": "Lime Juice", "amount": "3", "unit": "Tablespoons"}, {"name": "Cilantro - chopped finely", "amount": "4", "unit": "Tablespoons"}, {"name": "Salt & Pepper to taste", "amount": null, "unit": null}],"instructions":"Cut each avocado in half, remove stone with a knife, and scoop out meat with a spoon into a medium sized bowl. With the spoon, chop up the avocado until chunky and soft. Dice red onion finely and add to avocado. Add lime juice, add cilantro, add salt and pepper. Mix well and serve with your favorite tortilla chips.","attachment": null}

{"title":"PB&J 02","ingredients": [{"name": "Peanut Butter", "amount": "4", "unit": "Tablespoons"}, {"name": "Jelly", "amount": "3", "unit": "Tablespoons"}, {"name": "Bread", "amount": "2", "unit": "slice"}],"instructions":"Spread peanut butter on one slice of bread. Spread jelly on the other slice of bread. Put peanut butter and jelly sides of bread together, cut in half diagonally, and serve.","attachment": null}

{"title":"Bagel & Lox","ingredients": [{"name": "Bagel", "amount": "1", "unit": "each"}, {"name": "Lox", "amount": "1", "unit": "ounce"}, {"name": "Cream cheese", "amount": "3", "unit": "tablespoons"}, {"name": "Red onion - thin sliced", "amount": "4", "unit": "grams"}, {"name": "Capers", "amount": "2", "unit": "tablespoons"}],"instructions":"Toast bagel, then spread cream cheese on both sides. Sprinkle capers on the cream cheese so they stick. Place red onion and lox on top of capers. Place top of bagel on the rest. Cut in half and serve.","attachment": null}
